CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 9 reads: "Homemakers See Latest in Foods, Appliances... 11. The Art-Craft Mantel Company's beautiful fireplace lent a homey atmosphere to their booth. Representatives are Robert Meeham, Albert Caufigure and Lester E. Cauffiell...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Robert Meeham, Albert Caufigure, and Lester E. Cauffiell gathered around faux fireplace in Artcraft Mantel Company booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Fireplaces--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
